attributes.action: sack all dishonest Members of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of Parliament are responsible for passing just laws for the benefit of all members of the UK. If they are seen to be less than honest how can they justifiably pass laws affecting millions of honest citizens?

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
